name: ESTATE of John BRICKAJLIK, Deceased. Appeal of John BRICKAJLIK and Michael Brickajlik

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
EAGEN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: ESTATE of John BRICKAJLIK, Deceased. Appeal of John BRICKAJLIK and Michael Brickajlik.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Decree affirmed. Costs on appellants.
EAGEN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Edward J. Hardiman, Robert G. Rosen, Pearlstine, Salkin, Hardiman & Robinson, Lansdale, for appellants.
William H. Eastburn, III, John A. Van Luvanee East-burn & Gray, Doylestown, Donald B. Smith & Associates, Perkasie, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
344 A.2d 461
ESTATE of John BRICKAJLIK, Deceased. Appeal of John BRICKAJLIK and Michael Brickajlik.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Nov. 13, 1974.
Decided Oct. 3, 1975.
Edward J. Hardiman, Robert G. Rosen, Pearlstine, Salkin, Hardiman & Robinson, Lansdale, for appellants.
William H. Eastburn, III, John A. Van Luvanee East-burn & Gray, Doylestown, Donald B. Smith & Associates, Perkasie, for appellees.
Before JONES, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
